name: Church on the Go Standard
description:
Includes:

• Instructions

• Theme Cards (52)

• Offering Cards/Prayer Request Cards (25)

• Activity Cards (6)

• Stress Reliever

• Offering Box

• WOW Hits 2012 - Music CD (30+ songs) 

Add on your own:
Bible – (Children’s Bible, Teen Bible and/or Adult Bible)

Decoration – We suggest a cross or family heirloom

Shipping and Handling is an additional $10.00.

** Free Pickup option in Kenosha, WI. **
